Rulings.Edison:
This card is returned to the top of the Deck if:
● It would be sent to the GY while "Macro Cosmos" is applying.
● It would be sent from the Spell/Trap Zone to the GY.

This card is NOT returned to the top of the Deck if:
● It is destroyed and banished by "Bottomless Trap Hole".
● Its Summon is negated by "Solemn Judgment" or "Thunder King Rai-Oh".
● It would be sent from the field to the GY while "Skill Drain" is applying.
● It would be sent from the field to the GY while "Grave Protector" is applying.
● It would be sent from the field to the GY while "G.B. Hunter" is applying.
● It would be sent from the field to the GY while face-down (unless it was destroyed by battle).

●If this card is destroyed by battle, the ② stops applying in Substep 6 ("Tragoedia"'s effect can't be activated).
Rulings.Tengu:
This card is returned to the top of the Deck if:
● It would be sent to the GY while "Macro Cosmos" is applying.
● It would be sent from the Spell/Trap Zone to the GY.

This card is NOT returned to the top of the Deck if:
● It is destroyed and banished by "Bottomless Trap Hole".
● Its Summon is negated by "Solemn Judgment" or "Thunder King Rai-Oh".
● It would be sent from the field to the GY while "Skill Drain" is applying.
● It would be sent from the field to the GY while "Grave Protector" is applying.
● It would be sent from the field to the GY while "G.B. Hunter" is applying.
● It would be sent from the field to the GY while face-down (unless it was destroyed by battle).

Rulings.Base:
1. You can Normal Summon this monster.
2. The effect to add a Fairy-Type monster to your hand targets 1 Fairy-Type monster in your GY.
3. If "Archlord Kristya" is sent to the GY face-down, its effect to return to the top of the Deck is not applied.
4. If "Macro Cosmos" is active and your face-up "Archlord Kristya" would be sent from the field to the GY, it will still return to the top of the owner's Deck.
5. If "Archlord Kristya" is destroyed by battle while "Grave Protector" is face-up on the field the effect of "Grave Protector" will apply and Kristya will be shuffled back into the Deck. If "Archlord Kristya" is destroyed by battle with "Dark Magician of Chaos" it will be removed from play instead of returning to the Deck.
6. If "Skill Drain" is active, the effect to return "Archlord Kristya" to the Deck will not apply.
7. If "Archlord Kristya" is equipped to "Relinquished" while face-up and then later destroyed it will return to the Deck.
8. If "G.B. Hunter" is face-up on the field, the effect of "Archlord Kristya" to return to the Deck will not be applied.

PSCT.Edison:
① If there are exactly 4 Fairies in your GY, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). 
② If Summoned this way: Target 1 Fairy in your GY; add that target to your hand. 
③ Neither player can attempt to Special Summon monsters. 
④ If this face-up card would be sent from the field to the GY, return it to the top of the Deck, instead.
PSCT.Tengu:
① If there are exactly 4 Fairies in your GY, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). 
② If Summoned this way: Target 1 Fairy in your GY; add that target to your hand. 
③ Neither player can attempt to Special Summon monsters. 
④ If this face-up card would be sent from the field to the GY, return it to the top of the Deck, instead.

PSCT.Base: If you have exactly 4 Fairy monsters in your GY, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If Summoned this way: Target 1 Fairy monster in your GY; add that target to your hand. Neither player can Special Summon monsters. If this face-up card would be sent from the field to the GY, place it on top of the Deck, instead.
